Content:
Pastor Tommy McMurtry was saved at an early age, and was raised in a pastor’s home his entire life. He is well acquainted with the ministry life! He was called to full time Christian service while spending the summer as a camp counselor at the age of 19. He came home, and was hired part-time at Lighthouse Baptist Church, learning under his father, Pastor Tom McMurtry. He worked towards his Theology Degree while falling in love, getting married, and having two children! ![](https://dl.airtable.com/NX8i5i8XS5GtoYB7s0vg_full_Tommy%20McMurtry.jpg){:style="float: right;margin-right: 7px;margin-top: 7px;height: 250px;"}

He graduated from Lighthouse Baptist College with a Bachelor’s degree of Theology in 2003. He was ordained shortly after. He worked for ten years as an assistant pastor, music director, and also in the school as the school supervisor for six of those years. He has worked with children, teens, adults, and senior citizens. He came to the Rock Falls/ Sterling area with a burden in his heart for the people here. He can’t wait to see what great things God has in store for Liberty Baptist Church!
